name: Goodlook.me
description: The New Way To Find Clothes
overview:
Goodlook.me is the online shopping mall that learns your sense of style.

The fashion industry is the biggest its ever been in history. With millions of clothing brands and new clothes coming out daily, it has become difficult for the average shopper to sort through all of the good and bad to finally find something that fits their look.

Goodlook.me provides a solution to this by presenting hand-picked items from thousands of different websites. As the shopper see these new products, they can mark the items they like with a â€œGood Lookâ€, and the items they don’t like with a “Bad Lookâ€. Through this interactive rating proccess, the system gradually learns more about the type of clothes the shopper prefers and delivers personalized results based on their taste. The shopper can also filter results based on size, color, and category.
